name: Jenga Payment Gateway for WooCommerce
author: Finserve Africa

sections.description:
Jenga Payment Gateway offers an intuitive and convenient buying experience that can help your customers
spend more time shopping and less time checking out. Jenga Payment Gateway is
used by large and small companies. From years of offering financial services securely, customers
can trust their personal information will remain secure. Businesses have the reassurance of our
advanced fraud protection and payment protection policy.

Plugin Features

Accept payment via MasterCard, Visa, and American express, Mpesa, Airtel Money and Equitel.

3.0.8

  • Woocommerce compatibility issue Fixes

3.0.7

  • Woocommerce compatibility issue Fixes

3.0.6

  • Bug Fixes

3.0.5

  • Support for wordpress 6.5

3.0.4

  • Jenga Payment Gateway-v3.0.4 for WooCommerce published.

1.0.3

  • Jenga Payment Gateway for WooCommerce Version 1.0.3 for WooCommerce published.
sections.installation:
1. Login to your WordPress Admin area
  2. Go to Plugins > Add New from the left hand menu
  3. In the search box type “Jenga Payment Gateway for WooComerce”
  4. From the search result you will see Jenga Payment Gateway for WooComerce click on Install Now to install the plugin
  5. A popup window will ask you to confirm your wish to install the Plugin
  6. After installation, activate the plugin, this adds a menu item on the left Admin menu
  7. Use the settings menu option on the Jenga PGW Admin menu to configure the plugin to work effectively on your site
sections.faq:
Where can I find help and documentation to understand Jenga Payment Gateway?

You can find help and information on Jenga Payment Gateway on our Site,
